specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was bad, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.
When the work result was good, $0 restored 20% of the max SP to all employees in the department.
When the Qliphoth Counter lowered to zero, a random Abnormalitiy's containment unit went into meltdown.
For every 4 employee or clerk deaths in the facility, the Qliphoth Counter reduced by 1.
When the Qliphoth Counter lowered to zero, employees in the department took 30% of their max HP as BLACK damage.

When a Qliphoth meltdown occurs, a random employee became compelled to work on a random Abnormality. If the work result was bad, the Qliphoth Counter of $0 reduced by 1. If the work result was good, employees from the same team restored 10% HP. After that, the agent became dazed, and was unable to work for two minutes.
When the Qliphoth Counter of T-04-53 lowered to zero, $0's Qliphoth Counter decreased.
